languages.text:
Ошибка!
Всякий, кто попытается приблизиться к Жертве, будет убит бритвенной шрапнелью. Я выпускаю новый смертоносный веер, но снаряды летят мимо: прицел сбивает двухголовая тварь, с криком врезавшаяся в меня со спины и качнувшая приклад. Я разберусь с тварью позже, сломаю ей крылья. Сейчас важна только Жертва.

A mistake!
Anyone who tries to approach the Prey will be killed by the brittle shrapnel. I unleash a new fan of crystalline shards, but the shots go wide: my aim is disrupted by a two-headed creature as it crashes into my back with a shriek, and the stock of my shardcarbine sways. I will deal with it later: I will break its wings. Right now, only the Prey matters.
languages.original_text:
Ошибка!
Всякий, кто попытается приблизиться к Жертве, будет убит бритвенной шрапнелью. Я выпускаю новый смертоносный веер, но снаряды летят мимо: прицел сбивает двухголовая тварь, с криком врезавшаяся в меня со спины и качнувшая приклад. Я разберусь с тварью позже, сломаю ей крылья. Сейчас важна только Жертва.

traits.locale_text:
A mistake!
Anyone who tries to approach the Prey will be killed by the brittle shrapnel. I unleash a new fan of crystalline shards, but the shots go wide: my aim is disrupted by a two-headed creature as it crashes into my back with a shriek, and the stock of my shardcarbine sways. I will deal with it later, I will break its wings. Right now, only the Prey matters.

I will deal with it later: I will break its wings. Right now, only the Prey matters.

languages.text:
猎物犯了个错误！
所有打算接近猎物的人都会被弹片杀死。我举起手中的枪，射出了另一波水晶弹片，但却偏了准头。因为一只长着两颗头颅的猎鹰尖叫着，撞在了我的背上，我手里的碎片卡宾枪也瞄歪了。这只猎鹰我过一会儿再对付，我要把它的翅膀撕下来，但现在，我必须把注意力集中在猎物身上。
languages.original_text:
A mistake!
Anyone who tries to approach the Prey will be killed by the brittle shrapnel. I unleash a new fan of crystalline shards, but the shots go wide: my aim is disrupted by a two-headed creature as it crashes into my back with a shriek, and the stock of my shardcarbine sways. I will deal with it later: I will break its wings. Right now, only the Prey matters.

traits.locale_text:
猎物犯了个错误！
所有打算接近猎物的人都会被弹片杀死。我举起手中的枪，射出了另一波水晶弹片，但却偏了准头。因为一只长着两颗头颅的猎鹰尖叫着，撞在了我的背上，我手里的碎片卡宾枪也瞄歪了。这只猎鹰我过一会儿再对付，我要把它的翅膀撕下来，但现在，我必须把注意力集中在猎物身上。

languages.text:
失敗だ！
獲物に近づこうとする者は、もろい破片によって殺されるだろう。新たな結晶の破片を放つが、外してしまった。背後に双頭の生き物が悲鳴をあげてぶつかり、シャードカービンのストックが揺れたため、狙いが乱された。そいつは後で片付ける。翼を折ってやる。今はただ、獲物だけが重要だ。
languages.original_text:
A mistake!
Anyone who tries to approach the Prey will be killed by the brittle shrapnel. I unleash a new fan of crystalline shards, but the shots go wide: my aim is disrupted by a two-headed creature as it crashes into my back with a shriek, and the stock of my shardcarbine sways. I will deal with it later: I will break its wings. Right now, only the Prey matters.

traits.locale_text:
失敗だ！
獲物に近づこうとする者は、もろい破片によって殺されるだろう。新たな結晶の破片を放つが、外してしまった。背後に双頭の生き物が悲鳴をあげてぶつかり、シャードカービンのストックが揺れたため、狙いが乱された。そいつは後で片付ける。翼を折ってやる。今はただ、獲物だけが重要だ。

languages.text:
Ein Fehler!
Jeder, der es wagt, sich der Beute zu nähern, wird von dem brüchigen Schrapnell getötet. Ich setze einen neuen Fächer von Kristallsplittern ein, aber die Schüsse gehen daneben: Ich kann nicht zielen, weil eine zweiköpfige Kreatur kreischend in meinem Rücken landet und den Lauf meines Splitterkarabiners ablenkt. Ich kümmere mich später um sie. Ich werde ihr die Flügel brechen. Jetzt zählt nur die Beute.
languages.original_text:
A mistake!
Anyone who tries to approach the Prey will be killed by the brittle shrapnel. I unleash a new fan of crystalline shards, but the shots go wide: my aim is disrupted by a two-headed creature as it crashes into my back with a shriek, and the stock of my shardcarbine sways. I will deal with it later: I will break its wings. Right now, only the Prey matters.

traits.locale_text:

Ich setze einen neuen Fächer von Kristallsplittern ein, aber die Schüsse gehen daneben: Ich kann nicht zielen, weil eine zweiköpfige Kreatur kreischend in meinem Rücken landet und den Lauf meines Splitterkarabiners ablenkt. Ich kümmere mich später um sie. Ich werde ihr die Flügel brechen. Jetzt zählt nur die Beute.

languages.text:
Hata!
Av'a yaklaşacak her kim olursa kırılgan şarapnel taneleri fırtınasında can verir. Kristal parçacıklardan yeni bir sağanak salıyorum, ne var ki atışlarım hedefini şaşırıyor. Sırtıma çığlıkla çarpan çift başlı yaratık nişanımı saptırıyor, parçakarabinamın dipçiği savruluyor. Onunla sonra ilgileneceğim, kanatlarını tek tek kıracağım. Şimdi tek mühim olan Av.
languages.original_text:
A mistake!
Anyone who tries to approach the Prey will be killed by the brittle shrapnel. I unleash a new fan of crystalline shards, but the shots go wide: my aim is disrupted by a two-headed creature as it crashes into my back with a shriek, and the stock of my shardcarbine sways. I will deal with it later: I will break its wings. Right now, only the Prey matters.

traits.locale_text:

Av'a yaklaşacak her kim olursa kırılgan şarapnel taneleri fırtınasında can verir. Kristal parçacıklardan yeni bir sağanak salıyorum, ne var ki atışlarım hedefini şaşırıyor. Sırtıma çığlıkla çarpan çift başlı yaratık nişanımı saptırıyor, parçakarabinamın dipçiği savruluyor. Onunla sonra ilgileneceğim, kanatlarını tek tek kıracağım. Şimdi tek mühim olan Av.

languages.text:
¡Un error!
Quien intente acercarse a la presa morirá bajo la metralla quebradiza. Desato un nuevo abanico de fragmentos cristalinos, pero los disparos no dan en el blanco: una criatura de dos cabezas arruina mi puntería al chocar contra mi espalda con un chillido, y la culata de mi carabina cristalina se desvía a un lado. Me encargaré de ella más tarde; romperé sus alas. Por ahora, solo importa la presa.
languages.original_text:
A mistake!
Anyone who tries to approach the Prey will be killed by the brittle shrapnel. I unleash a new fan of crystalline shards, but the shots go wide: my aim is disrupted by a two-headed creature as it crashes into my back with a shriek, and the stock of my shardcarbine sways. I will deal with it later: I will break its wings. Right now, only the Prey matters.

traits.locale_text:
¡Un error!
Quien intente acercarse a la presa morirá bajo la metralla quebradiza. Desato un nuevo abanico de fragmentos cristalinos, pero los disparos no dan en el blanco: una criatura de dos cabezas arruina mi puntería al chocar contra mi espalda con un chillido, y la culata de mi carabina cristalina se desvía a un lado. Me encargaré de ella más tarde; romperé sus alas. Por ahora, solo importa la presa.

languages.text:
Grave erreur !
Quiconque approche de la proie sera tué par le shrapnel fragilisé. Je tire une nouvelle volée de fragments cristallins, mais manque ma cible : le canon de ma carabine éclateuse est dévié par une créature à deux têtes qui me percute par-derrière en poussant un cri aigu. Peu importe, je l'attraperai plus tard et lui briserai les ailes. Pour le moment, seule la proie compte.
